original_text:
How you have fallen from heaven,
    morning star, son of the dawn!
You have been cast down to the earth,
    you who once laid low the nations!
korean_text: 너 아침의 아들 계명성이여 어찌 그리 하늘에서 떨어졌으며 너 열국을 엎은 자여 어찌 그리 땅에 찍혔는고

sentences.original_text: How you have fallen from heaven
morning star, son of the dawn
You have been cast down to the earth
you who once laid low the nations
